name: n-skills
description: Curated plugin marketplace for AI agents - works with Claude Code, Codex, and openskills

plugins.name: zai-cli
plugins.description: Z.AI vision, search, reader, and GitHub exploration via MCP

plugins.name: gastown
plugins.description: Multi-agent orchestrator for Claude Code. Use when user mentions gastown, gas town, gt commands, convoys, polecats, rigs, slinging work, multi-agent coordination.

plugins.name: dev-browser
plugins.description: Browser automation with persistent page state. Use when users ask to navigate websites, fill forms, take screenshots, extract web data, test web apps, or automate browser workflows.

plugins.name: orchestration
plugins.description: Multi-agent orchestration for complex tasks using cc-mirror tasks and TodoWrite. Use when tasks require parallel work, multiple agents, sophisticated coordination, or decomposition into parallel subtasks.

plugins.name: open-source-maintainer
plugins.description: End-to-end GitHub repository maintenance for open-source projects. Use when asked to triage issues, review PRs, analyze contributor activity, generate maintenance reports, or maintain a repository.
